name: OTP_DOSE_PARAMS
description: The dosing parameters for the order template.

columns.name: OTP_DW_RECORD_INST
columns.description: The date/time in external format when the dosing weight was recorded for the order template in this row.

columns.name: OTP_WT_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: The source of the dosing weight recorded for the order template in this row.

columns.name: OTP_WT_COMMENTS
columns.description: The comments for the dosing weight recorded for the order template in this row.

columns.name: OTP_DOSING_HEIGHT
columns.description: The dosing height in inches for the order template in this row

columns.name: OTP_HT_REC_INST
columns.description: The date/time in external format when the dosing height was recorded for the order template in this row.

columns.name: OTP_HT_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: The source of the dosing height recorded for the order template in this row.

columns.name: OTP_HT_COMMENTS
columns.description: The comments for the dosing height recorded for the order template in this row.

columns.name: OTP_DOSING_BSA
columns.description: The dosing body surface area (BSA) for the order template in this row.

columns.name: OTP_BSA_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description: The source of the dosing BSA for the order template in this row.
entries: Based on weight and height measured in the past
Based on most recent measured weight and height (actual)
Based on ideal body weight and current/past measured height
Based on adjusted body weight and current/past measured height
Based on dosing weight and current/past measured height

columns.name: OTP_BSA_CALC_DETAIL
columns.description: The dosing BSA calculation details for the order template in this row.

columns.name: OTP_BSA_COMMENTS
columns.description: The dosing BSA comments recorded for the order template in this row.

columns.name: OTP_DOSING_WEIGHT
columns.description: Stores order-specific dosing weight in kg.

columns.name: OTP_DOSING_BSA_ORIGINAL
columns.description: The original (uncapped) BSA of an order

columns.name: RECENT_RULE_DAT
columns.description: If this medication has a dosing rule, this will be the contact date (DAT) of the most recent dosing rule that was checked and matched the patient.
